task.en: Please demonstrate to me how to use iMovie to render a ProRes quality video. You can freely use footages in `/Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Faces`. Export to `ProRes.mov` under `Documents`.
task.zh: 请给我演示一下怎么用iMovie渲染一个ProRes质量的视频。你可以随便用`/Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Faces`里面的素材。导出到Documents文件夹下，文件名叫`ProRes.mov`。

pre_command: osascript -e 'quit app "iMovie"' && rm -rf "/Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" && cp -r "/Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" /Users/ec2-user/Movies/; rm -rf /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/ && cp -r /Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/benchmark_files /Users/ec2-user/Documents; osascript -e 'tell application "iMovie" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "f" using {control down, command down}'
grading_command: [ -e "/Users/ec2-user/Documents/ProRes.mov" ] && mdls -name kMDItemCodecs /Users/ec2-user/Documents/ProRes.mov 2>/dev/null | grep -q ProRes && echo "True" || echo "False"
